ygData.subject: Re: Dumb questions.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... way to ... expansion ... Many thanks. Dumb question number 2 :) I ve been looking for a Twisted Ajrah Treant in East Karana for a month and I ve never see
ygData.messageBody:
--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "David Name" <trekkie61@...> wrote:
>
> That's a stat that started with the new expansion. I've yet to see a
way to
> bring this number up or down. Mine has been at 15 ever since the
expansion
> came out.
>
> --------------------------------------------------------------------
>
> There is a stat at the bottom of my player stat window that says
> Corruption.
>
> I assume that is updated when a character commits an offense against
> his home town like attacking a member of one of their allies or, worse
> still, attacking someone in his own city. Please correct me if I'm
> wrong about that.
>
> My corruption stat is 15. Is there a way to remove corruption?
>
> _________________________________________________________________

Many thanks.
Dumb question number 2 :)
I've been looking for a Twisted Ajrah Treant in East Karana for a
month and I've never see it. I need the special item that only that
critter carries to complete a quest. Does it appear at a certain time
of day on a certain day of the week realtime or something?
